title: What do you hate about BTS' American interviews? - Quora

response.answer_text: I smack my forehead a lot during interviews so…. “arE you DaTing?”, “do YoU havE a GirLfriEnd?”I-. I find these questions to be awkward. Even if you ask these questions, would they tell you? Besides no, what another answer could you get? Yes, I have a girlfriend but please don’t mob her and send her death threats. ( I am only talking about a few Armys here, please don’t get offended). It puts a strain on the conversation, thanks Ellen “wHo do yoU waNt to coLlaB witH?’I’m pretty sure that BTS has gone through all the celebrities they can think of at this point. They might just hop on Famous Birthdays and start picking random people. repetitive, repetitive, repetitive questionsLooking at all those repetitives makes ME tired. So imagine BTS hearing the same 6 questions every time. The number of times I’ve heard V say saxophonist- or some version of it lol.  the lack of genuine curiosityI love some interviewers but others sound like me trying to act like I’m interested in the mites on people’s eyelashes. Sorry, but that was the first thing I thought of. I tried okay. But BTS takes time out of their day to answer questions in an industry (pop) that almost treats them like their a joke. It’s sad, and I tired of interviews treating them like this. I’ll add so more but here’s a happy BTS from a GOOD interview. whoops, can’t really find one. well, cheers!

I hate that the interviewers seem so fake around them… Like, they literally look like they are so uncomfortable being there! I remember one time when Ellen literally asked something so weird, that if they ever HOOKED UP yes that’s right HOOKED UP with a fan, and the translator explained to them what “Hooking up” means and so they all said no really quickly and they were really weirded out and Taehyung was like “Not- no!” and omg that was the best reaction but still I really think she was in the wrong for asking that, cause why on earth would someone do that? And a girl from another interview literally rejected Namjoon’s handshake, WHO WOULD DO THAT???? i would do that if I was in her shoes! (She seemed a little cranky hahaha)
